Title: VMukti IPCommunication Suite
Description: VMukti is leading Asterisk/ Yate enabled p2p Video IP Communications Suite for Web / PSTN. These serverless broadband ready platform enable OS community to save 90% on capital & operating costs over proprietary software for conferencing & Call Center.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
VMukti open source is leading Asterisk/ Yate enabled p2p Video IP Communications Suite for Web / PSTN. These serverless broadband ready platform enable OS community to save 90% on capital & operating costs over proprietary software for conferencing & Call Center.

  1. Download official releases: http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=162339
  2. Sample Files: http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=162339&package_id=261174
  3. VMukti Open source News: http://sourceforge.net/news/?group_id=162339
  4. VMukti Open source Home: http://www.vmukti.org
  1. VMukti Open source help Videos:
    1. http://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=vmukti&search_type=
  1. VMukti IPCommunication Suite help Documents:
    1. Usage scenario: http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=dvxrgr8_0g8jq49g5
    2. VMukti Open source Server installation guide: http://docs.google.com/View?id=dvxrgr8_1dqmknzfq
    3. VMukti Open source Client installation guide: http://docs.google.com/View?id=dw7m4s5_0gs8mjmf9
    4. VMukti FAQs: http://docs.google.com/Doc?id=df7ms3vq_97m3f4p5dv


Read me:

  1. After downloading the VMukti Open source setup (.zip file), first read the "Read me" text file before proceeding


Usage Scenarios:

  1. For user who wants to be a server:
    1. -Install the VMukti open source server setup with the help of VMukti open source server installation guide, which is kept inside the VMukti open source server setup folder
    2. -Then the user may act as a server as well as a client to this server.
    3. -After successful installation of the server, browse the VMukti with URL: http:///vmuktimeetingplace or http:///vmuktimeetingplace/vmukti.presentation.xbap , write your system's IP in place of .
    4. -The server user can send this URL to their clients to participate in its collaborative conference
  1. For user who wants to be a client:
    1. -Install the VMukti open source client setup with the help of VMukti open source client installation guide, which is kept inside the VMukti open source client setup folder
    2. -Get URL of the VMukti open source server started by server user
    3. -Browse this URL and participate in the collaborative conference


How Tos:

  1. How to - setup IIS as pre-requisite
  2. How to - setup .NET Framework as pre-requisite
  3. How to - setup SQL Server as pre-requisite
  4. How to - install VMukti Engine
  5. How to - develop and add own extension to VMukti system
  6. How to - collaborate



Demo, Videos & More details: http://www.vmukti.org

Along with open source products, vmukti also offers a Live/Pre-recorded video streaming solution. It provides you simple software to broadcast one of the unique features allows to upload live video feed from client end. for more info www.vmukti.com
